lines.text: if m is greater than c , increment a
if m is less than c , increment b
if a is greater than b , print " Mishka " and newline
lines.code: if ( a > b ) { cout << " Mishka " << endl ; }

lines.text: if a is less than b , print " Chris " and newline
lines.code: if ( a < b ) { cout << " Chris " << endl ; }

lines.text: if a is b , print " Friendship is magic ! ^ ^ " and newline
lines.code: if ( a == b ) { cout << " Friendship is magic!^^ " << endl ; }
